name: Plagued Station
description:
Plagued Station is a short platformer about saving the last survivors of a wrecked factory using your powerful turbo blaster. But be warned; allowing the power to run out may be very bad for you.

Made in under 72 hours for Ludum Dare 39 (Running out of Power)

Was pretty disappointed in this Ludum Dare game, ah well. :\

Down is to interact btw, I forgot to put that in the tutorial bit.

To avoid some tedium when the power runs out, pressing R will respawn you back at the start, though this will, however not bring the person with you. Also, I advise heavy usage of the tram system.

You do not lose any progress when you die, you only drop any person you're carrying, should've explained that in the game somewhere.

By: Robin Field - Programming/Art Billy Hobson - Music/SFX
